title: Engineering Problem-Solving Learning Through Virtual Chemical Vapor Deposition Lab Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational science concepts (chemical changes, basic principles of experimentation) and experience in solving simple engineering problems
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, where students solve semiconductor manufacturing process issues via virtual lab simulations and perform step-by-step activities/feedback through an LMS.

learning_goals: Students can explain ≥3 core stages of semiconductor manufacturing processes using virtual CVD lab simulations.
Learners can analyze data collected during problem-solving to identify ≥2 engineering design errors and propose solutions.
Students can reflectively document ≥3 scientific principles discovered during iterative experiments via project journals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
